title: Barefoot Gen, Volume Three: Life After the Bomb
description: Barefoot Gen Volume Three ―"Life After the Bomb" ―picks up the story with Gen, his mother and his baby brother searching for a place to rest in the bomb's aftermath. Facing rejection, hunger, and humiliation, they come to realize that they still have ―and can share ―three crucial their self-respect, their hope, and their inner strength.
author: Keiji Nakazawa
